doc.field: Subseries D: Portfolios and other personal work
Subseries D: Portfolios and other personal work
35 sleeves of portfolio work from 1981, 1982, and 1983 (though dates are uncertain). These include self-portraits, domestic scenes, subway scenes, street scenes, portraits, still lifes.
